query:
INSERT INTO subscriptions (telegram_user_id, id, status, current_period_end, updated_at)
                                    VALUES ($1, $2, 'active', $3, NOW())
                                    ON CONFLICT (telegram_user_id)
                                    DO UPDATE
                                    SET id = $2,
                                        status = 'active',
                                        current_period_end = $3,
                                        updated_at = NOW();
